definitions.definition: The resistance offered at a particular temperature by an electrical conductor of any given material in a cube of unit length, expressed in ohm-metres (Ωm) in the metric system of measurement.
The reciprocal of thermal conductivity , having SI unit: m K W

main_definition: ( electricity ) The resistance offered at a particular temperature by an electrical conductor of any given material in a cube of unit length, expressed in ohm-metres (Ωm) in the metric system of measurement.
secondary_definitions: ( thermodynamics ) The reciprocal of thermal conductivity , having SI unit: m K W
